subject.en: Multi-Factor Email for Identity Cloud login

html.en:
Hello {{object.givenName}}.

We have detected that your account has been updated. This update required a multi-factor challenge which was successful.

If you feel this message is in error or fraudulent activity has occurred on your account then please contact the Fedex Security Team.

Thanks,

Your FedEx Customer Team.

message.en:
Hello {{object.givenName}}.

We have detected that your account has been updated. This update required a multi-factor challenge which was successful.

If you feel this message is in error or fraudulent activity has occurred on your account then please contact the Fedex Security Team.

Thanks,

Your FedEx Customer Team.

html.en:
Hello {{object.givenName}},

your user profile has been updated. If you did not make those changes yourself or requested them, please contact us immediately.

Kindest regards.

subject.en: Your user profile has been updated

html.en:
Hello {{object.givenName}},

your user profile has been updated and your email address has changed. This email is sent to the old address we had on file. If you did not make those changes yourself or requested them, please contact us immediately.

Old: {{object.frUnindexedString5}}
New: {{object.mail}}

Kindest regards.
